home_subtitle: that saves you time and money.
home_description: ShopWise helps you manage your grocery expenses, find the best deals, and never forget an item on your list again.
powerful_features_description: Everything you need to optimize your shopping and save more.
feature_visual_insights_description: Track your spending with interactive charts and understand where your money is going.
feature_camera_register_description: Register your purchases instantly by scanning the receipt's QR code.
feature_smart_lists_description: Receive AI-powered suggestions and always know what's missing at home.
feature_full_control_description: Manage your profile, family settings, and notification preferences easily.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signup_description: Fill in the details below to start your journey with ShopWise.
logout_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout_confirm_desc: You will be returned to the homepage.
settings_description: Manage your account and app preferences.
profile_form_email_note: To change your email, please contact support.
profile_form_linked_accounts_desc: Connect your social accounts for faster login.
profile_form_change_password_desc: For your security, we recommend choosing a strong password.
profile_form_success_account_linked_desc: Your account has been successfully linked.
preferences_form_description: Customize the app's appearance and behavior.
preferences_form_push_notifications_desc: Receive alerts for suggestions and important updates.
preferences_form_error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to save settings.
preferences_form_error_generic: An unexpected error occurred while saving.
privacy_delete_data_desc: Permanently delete all your purchases, lists, and insights.
privacy_delete_data_note: This action is irreversible. All your data will be lost forever. We cannot recover it once deleted. This action does not delete your account.
privacy_delete_account_note: This action is irreversible. You will lose access to ShopWise and all your data will be permanently deleted.
delete_confirmation_code_prompt: To confirm, please type <1>{{code}}</1> in the box below.
privacy_delete_data_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete all your data?
privacy_delete_data_confirm_desc: This is a permanent action and cannot be undone.
privacy_delete_account_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
privacy_delete_account_confirm_desc: This is a permanent action and cannot be undone.
family_settings_description: Manage your family members, preferences and plan.
preferences_form_family_size_desc: This information helps us personalize suggestions.
coming_soon_history_desc: The family purchase history feature is under development and will be available soon.
plan_form_description: Choose the plan that best suits your family's needs.
plan_form_free_desc: Ideal for getting started and exploring basic features.
plan_form_premium_desc: Unlock the full power of ShopWise with AI.
market_form_add_new_desc: Register a new market to use in your manual entries.
market_form_error_name_min: Market name must have at least 2 characters.
market_form_toast_added_desc: {{marketName}} has been added to your favorites.
market_form_favorites_desc: These markets will appear as suggestions in manual entries.
market_form_ignored_desc: These markets will not be suggested to you.
market_form_toast_removed_desc: The market was removed from your lists.
shopping_list_description: Manage your active shopping list here.
add_item_placeholder: Add an item to the list...
suggestions_based_on_history: Based on your purchase history, you might also need:
error_getting_suggestions_desc: Could not get suggestions from the AI at this time.
add_purchase_description: Import a PDF receipt or enter the details manually.
error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to perform this action.
import_from_pdf_desc: Send a PDF of your NFC-e (electronic consumer receipt) and let our AI extract all the data for you.
scan_success_desc_pdf: The data was extracted from the PDF. Please review the items below before saving.
scan_error_desc_pdf_detailed: Could not extract data from the PDF. Please try another file or enter the data manually.
edit_item_description: Correct the information extracted by the AI.
admin_audit_description: Monitor system activities and run diagnostic tests.
admin_audit_content: Area for audit logs and system tests.
admin_market_insights_description: Analyze global market trends and product prices.
admin_notifications_description: Send and manage global notifications for users.
admin_dashboard_description: General overview of the system status.
admin_reports_description: Generate reports on application usage and user data.
admin_reports_content: Area for generating and viewing reports.
admin_security_description: Configure security policies and monitor access.
admin_users_description: View, edit, and manage application users.
dashboard_consumption_overview_desc: Your spending evolution over the last 12 months.
empty_state_no_chart_desc: Start adding your purchases to see your consumption analysis.
dashboard_top_expenses_desc: The products that had the biggest impact on your budget this month.
empty_state_no_expenses_desc: When you add a purchase, your most expensive items will appear here.
modal_total_spent_desc: Here's a breakdown of your spending at each store this month.
modal_items_bought_desc: These are the last 10 items you bought this month.
modal_main_category_desc: See how your spending is distributed across different categories this month.
modal_potential_savings_desc: Find out where you could have saved money by comparing prices.
empty_state_no_modal_data_desc: There is no detailed information to display for this card yet.
premium_feature_desc_consumption: Upgrade to the Premium plan to get detailed, AI-powered analysis of your consumption habits.
empty_state_no_analysis_desc: Add more purchases to enable AI-powered consumption analysis.
purchase_history_description: Review your past purchases and their details.
empty_state_no_history_desc: Your purchase history is empty. Add a new purchase to get started.
empty_state_no_recommendations_desc: As you add more purchases, we'll find savings opportunities for you.
delete_purchase_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete this purchase?
delete_purchase_confirm_desc: This action is irreversible. All items in this purchase will be deleted.
active_list_popover_desc: A quick view of your current list.
plan_feature_free_1: Manual and QR Code purchase registration
plan_feature_premium_1: All features from the Free plan
